p1: Fascinated by technology since childhood, I built computers, leading me to work for an e-commerce company as a Purchase Manager, purchasing computer components, blending my passion and expertise.
p2: At the age of 28, I pursued a bachelor's degree in Information Technology in Oslo, specializing in
p2a: . I found satisfaction in the user-centric aspect of frontend work, using code to create engaging and intuitive interfaces. Immersing myself in the intricacies of both backend and frontend development is interesting. I am intrigued by how various technologies interconnect behind the scenes, communicating with each other, to seamlessly fulfill user needs.
p3: I cherish nature, enjoying fly fishing for balance, and practice Brazilian jiu-jitsu for discipline. My love for board games and skiing reflects my strategic and competitive spirit, complementing my tech career.
